title: Game Stuck on RECONNECT Screen after patching
body:
Game Stuck on RECONNECT Screen after Champ Select, after the recent patching

Login - No problem 
Champ select - No problem

After the game starts, I was sent to the RECONNECT button screen and stuck there forever 
Every time I click on the button, it shows "Game in progress..." then turns back into the RECONNECT button a few seconds later.

I have tried: 
Restart my network (Ethernet)
Restart my computer 
Do a full client repair
Hextech tool
Uninstall & reinstall client

None of them worked. any help? or anyone has the same issue

replies.body: I'm having the same problem. Any and all help and options I've come across have not worked.

I am currently experiencing this problem. I've done everything listed and used the hextech repair tool, reinstalled, the whole lot. 
Can play multiple other games online no problems. Now just league doesn't work.
i have had the same issue tried everything yet still cant play a game.

Hi Aloha Salad Bar,

It's likely that you are impacted by [some of our recent changes](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/sB4ucqXc-game-client-anti-cheat-changes-going-live). Can you try disabling any third party software that you're running and see if it helps?
